entries.title: Many Android phones to get satellite connectivity
entries.description: When there is no mobile coverage, phones will be able to send and receive emergency texts via satellite.

entries.title: Twitter: Millions of users' email addresses 'stolen' in data hack
entries.description: Reports suggest more than 200 million sets of data were taken and are being given away on an online forum.

entries.title: WhatsApp to enable messaging in internet blackouts
entries.description: Instant-messaging service WhatsApp is letting users connect via proxy servers so they can stay online.

entries.title: Amazon to cut more than 18,000 jobs, CEO says
entries.description: The announcement comes after the technology giant said last year that it would reduce its headcount.
